events.message: I have filed a claim after my car was involved in an accident on Main Street yesterday afternoon.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident as it involves vehicle collision damage.
An agent has been assigned to your case to assist you with the next steps and required documentation.
Your claim for the auto accident has been formally acknowledged and is now being processed.
Please submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and a copy of your driving license.
I have submitted all requested documents including photos of the vehicle and the official police report.
The investigation has commenced to assess the extent of the collision damage and liability.
Our investigators have completed the review and confirmed the damage is consistent with the reported accident.
We have proposed a settlement amount covering vehicle repairs and loss of use during repair time.
The customer has reviewed the settlement proposal and requested clarification on some cost details.
Your claim has been approved based on our investigation and agreement on the settlement terms.
The payment covering the approved settlement has been issued to your nominated bank account.
Your claim has now been closed following the successful payment and resolution of the accident claim.
